scripts.build: yarn build:copyabi && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy: yarn prepare celo; yarn version patch; yarn prepare celo; graph auth --studio $STUDIO_PROD_KEY; graph deploy --studio goodcollective --version-label=v$npm_package_version
scripts.deploy-dev: yarn prepare celo-dev; graph auth --studio $STUDIO_PROD_KEY; graph deploy --studio goodcollective --version-label= --version-label=dev-v$npm_package_version
scripts.ship-local: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy-local
